member.name: T:ZiggyCreatures.Caching.Fusion.Plugins.MemoryBackplane.MemoryBackplaneOptions

member.name: P:ZiggyCreatures.Caching.Fusion.Plugins.MemoryBackplane.MemoryBackplaneOptions.ChannelPrefix
member.summary:
The prefix that will be used to construct the notification channel name.
NOTE: if not specified, the will be used.

member.param: The set of options to use with this instance of the backplane.
